mapper.select: select commuteNo, FK_employeeNo, nvl(to_char(startTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '-') as startTime, nvl(to_char(endTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), '-') as endTime, status, rest, overTimeYN from tbl_commute where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_commute(commuteNo, FK_employeeNo, startTime, status, rest, overTimeYN) values(commuteSeq.nextval, #{fk_employeeNo}, sysdate, 2, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update tbl_commute set startTime = sysdate, status = 2 where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
update tbl_commute set endTime = sysdate, status = 6 where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
update tbl_commute set status = #{status} where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sysdate)+0.9999)
mapper.select: select to_char( nvl( round(endTime - startTime , 8), 0) ) as workTime from tbl_commute where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and startTime BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw') and TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw')+6.99999
select departmentNo, FK_managerNo, departmentName from tbl_department where departmentNo != 100000

select nvl(to_char(startTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), '-') as startTime, nvl(to_char(endTime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), '-') as endTime from tbl_commute where fk_employeeNo = #{fk_employeeNo} and (starttime BETWEEN to_date(#{selectMonth}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and add_months(to_date(#{selectMonth}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 1)-0.00001)

select to_char(trunc(starttime) , 'iw') as weekNo , sum(nvl((endtime - starttime), 0) * 24 * 60 * 60) as worktime_sec from tbl_commute where fk_employeeno = ${fk_employeeNo} and to_char(starttime, 'yyyymm') = ${year_month} group by to_char(trunc(starttime) , 'iw') order by 1

SELECT to_char( b.dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) as dt , NVL( to_char(starttime, 'hh24:mi:ss') , '00:00:00') as starttime , NVL( to_char(endtime, 'hh24:mi:ss') , '00:00:00') as endtime , nvl( trunc((endtime - starttime) * 24 * 60 * 60) , 0) as worksec , rest FROM ( SELECT trunc(starttime) as dtt , starttime , endtime , rest FROM tbl_commute WHERE fk_employeeno = #{fk_employeeNo} and to_char(starttime, 'yyyy-mm') = #{year_month} )a right join ( SELECT to_date( #{year_month}, 'YYYY-MM') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (LAST_DAY( #{year_month}||'-01') - to_date( #{year_month}, 'YYYY-MM')+ 1 ) )b on b.dt = a.dtt ORDER BY b.dt
